seattle.needle module¶

The needle.py module contains a constructor for a SeattleAttraction (e.g. a space needle). These attractions have a single method, ride().

exception seattle.needle.AfterHoursError(needle, early_or_late)¶

Bases: Exception

An error for situations when someone tries to ride a needle when it’s closed.

Parameters

  • needle (SeattleAttraction) – Which needle someone tried to ride.

  • early_or_late (str) – Either ‘early’ or ‘late’, to indicate which time constraint is violated.

class seattle.needle.SeattleAttraction(needle_type='space', opening='08:00:00', closing='23:59:59')¶

Bases: object

A class for all seattle-based needle attractions

Parameters

  • needle_type (str) – Type of needle, e.g. “space”

  • opening (str) – Time needle opens to public, preferably in format 08:00:00

  • closing (str) – Time needle closes to public.

Examples

space_needle = SeattleAttraction() grunge_needle = SeattleAttraction(‘Nirvana’, ‘00:00:01’, ‘03:59:59’)

ride(start, end)¶

Validates that you can ride the needle from start to end, and returns the needle type.

Parameters

  • start (str) – when you try to start riding, preferably in format 08:00:00

  • end (str) – when you try to finish riding
